tgt_original: hastapūjāmāha - vajrasattva iti |  vajrasattvastanave'ṅguṣṭhe bhāvanīyaḥ latāyāṃ
kaniṣṭhāyāmākāśagarbheti nirvibhaktikaṃ sa ca tanuḥ sūkṣmaḥ durava-  bodharupatvāt |
sarvāṅgulinakheṣu ca haya-  grīvaḥ | caḥ samuccaye |
te tathā mūlamantrādayaḥ |  pratipattiśāntikādikarmasu yojitāste bhedād draṣṭavyāḥ |
kramānatikramāt bhedamāha - varṇetyādi |  dūtya ādibhūtā yeṣāṃ vīrāṇāṃ te dūtyādayo  varṇyanta iva varṇāḥ khaṇḍakapālyādayaḥ |
anyonyaghaṭitā mantrāḥ praveśena tu bheditāḥ |  valyamānarajjuvadanyonyasthāne ghaṭitāni punaḥ punargatānyakṣarāṇi yeṣāṃ te'nyonyaghaṭitā  mantrā iti saṃkṣepārthaḥ |
